title: Behaviour modification: teaching language to psychotic children (TEFC)
creator_credit: O-Ivor Lovaas, Robert Aller and Appleton-Century-Crofts
brief_description: Shows typical speech patterns of autistic and schizophrenic children, and discusses correction of these before learning begins. Demonstrates instruction methods in imitation of sounds, labelling of objects, discrimination between alternatives, recall of experiences, and development of some spontaneity.
